import './company-add-coupon.css' import history from './../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import { getToday } from './../../../../../../../../utils/dateUtil' import CompanyService from './../../../../../../../../services/user-services/CompanyService' export default function CompanyAddCoupon() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/company/my-coupons') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { CompanyService.createCoupon( ) history.push('/company/my-coupons') setTimeout(() => { alert('success') }, (0)) } return ( <>
